interpretation: The left arrow curving right is a symbol of change and redirection. It suggests that a new direction is needed in order to move forward. This card may indicate that you are at a crossroads and need to make a decision about which path to take. It may also suggest that you need to let go of old patterns or habits in order to make room for something new. This can be a challenging process, but it is necessary for growth and progress. Trust your instincts and follow your heart, even if it means taking a different route than you originally planned. The left arrow curving right reminds us that sometimes the road less traveled can lead to unexpected and exciting destinations. Embrace the unknown and be open to new opportunities. This card encourages us to be brave and take a leap of faith in the pursuit of our dreams.
